item.title: Why I Built Litestream
item.description: When I was your age… I can tell I’m getting old because I talk about the “good old days” of computing. Back when knowing a single programming language and SQL was good enough to work at most jobs. Back when you could build all your web pages with basic HTML skills. But the good old days weren’t actually that good. They kinda sucked. In 1995, the LAMP stack emerged. It was a combination of Linux, Apache, MySQL, & PHP.
